opis: Prodaje se lijepa kuća u Fužinama, naselje Vrelo, na predivnoj i mirnoj lokaciji okruženoj zelenilom. Ova kuća Fužine sastoji se od prizemlja i kata. U prizemlju se nalaze ulazni hodnik, WC, jedna spavaća soba i prostrani, klimatizirani dnevni boravak s velikim kaminom, kuhinjom i blagovaonom te s izlazom na veliku natkrivenu terasu. Na gornjem katu se nalaze tri spavaće sobe, spremište, kupaona s podnim grijanjem te terasa s prekrasnim pogledom na zelenilo. Površina kuće: oko 130 m2. Površina parcele: 385 m2. Okućnica je zelena, te je u njoj moguće parkirati više automobila. U blizini kuće se nalaze brojni sadržaji - spilja Vrelo, plaža s kafićem, te jezera Lepenica i Fužine, ranč, i slično, što kuću čini idealnim mjestom za aktivan odmor ili mirnu relaksaciju u netaknutoj prirodi i svježem zraku. Uredno vlasništvo. ___________________ EN This is a beautiful house is for sale in Fužine, Vrelo neighborhood, in a beautiful and peaceful location surrounded by greenery. This house in Fužine consists of a ground floor and an upper floor. The ground floor consists of an entrance hall, a toilet room, one bedroom and a spacious, air-conditioned living room with a large fireplace, kitchen and dining area, with access to a large covered terrace. On the upper floor there are three bedrooms, a storage room, a bathroom with underfloor heating and a terrace with a beautiful view on the greenery. House area: aroud 130 m2. Plot area: 385 m2. The house is surrounded by grass yard. It is possible to park several cars in the yard. There are numerous facilities near the house - the Vrelo cave, a beach with a bar, lakes Lepenica and Fužine, a ranch, ..., which makes the house an ideal place for an active vacation or peaceful relaxation in untouched nature and fresh air. Proper ownership. ID KOD AGENCIJE: 7212 Andrea Zeneral Mob: 099 673 1949 Tel: 051/301-502 E-mail: andrea@sretnistanovi.hr www.sretnistanovi.hr
